casebody.data:
Audrey SAMPSON, Individually and as Executrix of the Estate of John Sampson, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
3M COMPANY, f/k/a Minnesota Mining & Manufacturing Company, et al., Defendants. M-451/452 September Term 2018
081932 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 11, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of BASF Catalysts, LLC for leave to appeal (M-451) is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the Superior Court, Appellate Division; and it is further

ORDERED that the miscellaneous motion to provisionally seal the Appellate record (M-452) is dismissed as moot. Jurisdiction is not retained.
